Articles.Content:
So i've Been KSP for A month and a half (I rarely play Cuz School) And i already Master Orbit, Rendezvous, Docking (Sometime) and Building base, But there something A bit a problem I don't Know how to Resource Scan.

I already know How to Create the Satellite/ Probe but idk the Height. Can you tell me what is the best Height for Resource scanning (For every Planet and Moon of course) ?
It depends on the body you're orbiting.  Get in orbit and activate, it well tell you what the requirements are if you're not already with in them.
